body_html: This is a pretty significant usability problem with TensorBoard. We often run TensorBoard on directories with many runs, and being unable to filter runs by name makes it very difficult to do useful things with TensorBoard.
body_text: This is a pretty significant usability problem with TensorBoard. We often run TensorBoard on directories with many runs, and being unable to filter runs by name makes it very difficult to do useful things with TensorBoard.
body: This is a pretty significant usability problem with TensorBoard. We often run TensorBoard on directories with many runs, and being unable to filter runs by name makes it very difficult to do useful things with TensorBoard.
